item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+可能坚持石油增产计划
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）敦促欧佩克（OPEC）降低价格，但欧佩克+组织的代表告诉路透社记者，欧佩克+组织可能会在周一举行的最高部长小组会议上坚持目前的计划，即从四月份开始逐步提高产量。【原文：OPEC+ is likely to adhere to current plans to raise output gradually from April when a panel of top ministers meets on Monday, delegates from the producer group told Reuters, despite U.S. President Donald Trump urging OPEC to lower prices.】

item.title: 特朗普关税对高盛标普 500 指数盈利预测的影响高达 3
item.description: 高盛的经济学家估计，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在第二个任期上任后宣布的最新贸易关税措施得以持续，那么美国企业的底线可能会被大幅削减。【原文：Goldman Sachs economists estimate that if the latest trade tariffs announced by U.S. President Donald Trump after assuming office in his second term are sustained, they could take a significant chunk out of Corporate America's bottom line.】

item.title: 高盛集团称，全球对冲基金抛售了除房地产股以外的所有股票
item.description: 就在美国总统特朗普宣布加征关税导致全球市场暴跌之前，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）表示，对冲基金上周抛弃了全球股市，并增加了对股市下跌的押注。【原文：Hedge funds last week jettisoned global stocks and added bets they would decline, said Goldman Sachs , just before U.S. President Trump announced tariffs that sent global markets tumbling.】

item.title: 美国 市场因 "关税人 "而不安
item.description: 欧洲、中东和非洲地区金融和市场突发新闻记者 Alun John 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Alun John, EMEA breaking news correspondent, finance and markets.】

item.title: 谷歌要求美国上诉法院推翻应用商店判决
item.description: Alphabet 旗下谷歌和 "堡垒之夜 "游戏制造商 Epic Games 的律师将于周一在加利福尼亚州的一家美国上诉法院对簿公堂，因为谷歌试图推翻陪审团的裁决和法官迫使其改造应用商店的命令。【原文：Lawyers for Alphabet's Google and "Fortnite" maker Epic Games are set to square off before a U.S. appeals court in California on Monday, as Google tries to undo a jury verdict and a judge's order forcing it to revamp its app store.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普的纪念币交易费用近 1 亿美元，小交易商却亏了钱
item.description: 根据三家区块链分析公司的估算，唐纳德-特朗普总统的加密钱币背后的实体在不到两周的时间里积累了近 1 亿美元的交易费用，这是一个让数以万计的小交易商亏损的风险投资所带来的巨额暴利。【原文：Entities behind President Donald Trump’s crypto coin have accumulated close to $100 million in trading fees in less than two weeks, according to estimates from three blockchain analysis firms, a large windfall from a venture that has seen tens of thousands of small traders lose money.】

item.title: 美国冬季COVID浪潮较小，辉瑞公司扭亏压力增大
item.description: 有迹象表明，今年冬天美国的 COVID-19 病例比往年要少得多，这可能会给辉瑞公司带来更大的压力，迫使其从非 COVID 治疗中寻找增长点。【原文：Health experts are seeing signs of a much smaller wave of U.S. COVID-19 cases this winter than in previous years, which could put additional pressure on Pfizer to find growth from its non-COVID treatments.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，贸易战担忧搅动美国汽车巨头和大型科技公司股价
item.description: 周一，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令对墨西哥、加拿大和中国全面征收关税，引发了对全球贸易战可能打击经济增长的担忧，汽车制造商和大型科技股在股市大面积回落中首当其冲。【原文：Shares of automakers and megacap tech stocks bore the brunt of a wider equity pullback on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump ordered sweeping tariffs against Mexico, Canada and China, sparking fears of a global trade war that could hit growth.】

item.title: 汉莎航空首席执行官表示，汉莎航空将从 2025 年开始利用 ITA 盈利
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司首席执行官卡斯滕-斯波尔（Carsten Spohr）周一表示，德国汉莎航空公司将从今年开始从对 ITA Airways 的投资中获利。【原文：Germany's Lufthansa will start making money from its investment in ITA Airways from this year, the chief executive of the German carrier, Carsten Spohr, said on Monday.】

item.title: 聚焦：阿根廷农场枯萎的树叶预示着大豆和玉米收成将受到更大打击
item.description: 农民达里奥-萨比尼（Dario Sabini）站在田间高大干枯的玉米植株间，检查着比往常小一些的玉米棒子，然后拿起发黄的叶子在手指间揉搓，这个季节的玉米应该是绿色的。【原文：Standing in his fields among tall, dry corn plants, farmer Dario Sabini inspects the smaller-than-usual corn cobs before taking the yellowing leaves of the crop that should be green at this time of the season, to crinkle them between his fingers.】

item.title: 中国应如何应对特朗普？问深科技
item.description: 从尖锐的政治问题到深刻的个人问题，中国网民描述了向 DeepSeek 人工智能应用程序提出的问题，包括中国政府应该如何应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的进口关税。【原文：From the sharply political to the deeply personal, Chinese internet users have described questions asked of the DeepSeek artificial intelligence app, including what Beijing should do in response to U.S. President Donald Trump's import tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税引发贸易战风险，期货价格暴跌
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对墨西哥、加拿大和中国征收高额关税后，全球市场担心全面贸易战及其对全球经济的影响，美国股指期货周一暴跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures tumbled on Monday as fears of a full-blown trade war and its impact on the global economy jolted markets around the world after President Donald Trump levied steep tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China.】

item.title: 台湾禁止政府部门使用 DeepSeek 人工智能
item.description: 台湾周一禁止政府部门使用中国初创公司 DeepSeek 的人工智能（AI）服务，因为它存在安全风险。【原文：Taiwan on Monday banned government departments from using Chinese startup DeepSeek's artificial intelligence (AI) service as it was a security risk, toughening language from last week which said it should not be used.】

item.title: PMI显示欧元区工厂活动出现企稳迹象
item.description: 一项调查显示，欧元区陷入困境的制造业在年初出现了一些企稳迹象，企业摆脱了成本上升和美国关税的威胁，对前景更加乐观。【原文：The euro zone's beleaguered manufacturing industry showed some signs of stabilisation at the start of the year as firms brushed off rising costs and the threat of U.S. tariffs to become more upbeat about the outlook, a survey showed.】

item.title: 盖洛普民意调查显示，美国人对特朗普的经济寄予厚望
item.description: 盖洛普（Gallup）周一的一项民意调查显示，与十多年来（包括唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）首次担任总统的鼎盛时期）相比，美国人更看好美国经济和股市，对通胀和借贷成本下降也更有希望。【原文：Americans are more bullish on the U.S. economy and the stock market and more hopeful about falling inflation and borrowing costs than they have been in a decade or more, including in the heyday of Donald Trump's first presidency, a Gallup poll showed on Monday.】

item.title: -对特朗普对墨西哥、加拿大和中国征收高额关税的反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普已下令对墨西哥、加拿大和中国的商品全面征收关税，要求这些国家遏制非法移民和芬太尼流入美国，从而拉开了一场可能阻碍全球经济增长和刺激通货膨胀的贸易战的序幕。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has ordered sweeping tariffs on goods from Mexico, Canada and China, demanding that they curb the flow of illegal immigrants and fentanyl into the United States, kicking off a trade war that could dent global growth and stoke inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普征收关税后欧洲汽车制造商股价下跌
item.description: 周一，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对来自墨西哥和加拿大的商品征收25%的新关税，对来自中国的进口商品征收10%的新关税，引发了人们对欧盟进口商品也可能征收关税的担忧，一些欧洲最大的汽车制造商股价暴跌。【原文：Shares in some of the biggest European carmakers slumped on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump imposed new tariffs of 25% on goods from Mexico and Canada and 10% on imports from China, raising concern over possible duties on EU imports too.】

item.title: EssilorLuxottica 的 Nuance 音频眼镜获得 FDA 认证
item.description: 依视路（EssilorLuxottica）周一表示，美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）为其非处方 Nuance 音频眼镜开了绿灯。【原文：EssilorLuxottica said on Monday it received a green light from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for its over-the-counter Nuance audio glasses.】

item.title: Stellantis 采用新的内部组织结构，继续物色新任首席执行官
item.description: Stellantis 周一宣布了一项旨在简化结构和加快流程的内部改革，这家汽车制造商在前首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）于 12 月离职后开始推进重组。【原文：Stellantis announced on Monday an internal overhaul aimed at simplifying its structure and speeding up processes, as the carmaker presses ahead with a reorganisation it started after former CEO Carlos Tavares left in December.】

item.title: 聚焦：DeepSeek 让欧洲科技公司有机会在全球人工智能竞赛中迎头赶上
item.description: 德国初创公司 Novo AI 的老板 Hemanth Mandapati 是 DeepSeek 聊天机器人的早期采用者，两周前他从 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 改用了中国的人工智能模型。【原文：Hemanth Mandapati, boss of German startup Novo AI, was an early adopter of DeepSeek chatbots when he switched to the Chinese AI model from OpenAI's ChatGPT two weeks ago.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：中国将提议恢复 2020 年与美国的 "第一阶段 "贸易协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引消息人士的话报道，中国对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府加征关税的初步建议将以恢复特朗普第一任期内于2020年签署的第一阶段贸易协议为中心。【原文：China's initial proposal to tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump's administration will centre on restoring the Phase 1 trade deal signed in 2020 during Trump's first term, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing sources.】

item.title: 早间竞价特朗普关税现实令市场不安
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 软银与 OpenAI 同意成立日本人工智能合资企业
item.description: 软银集团首席执行官孙正义（Masayoshi Son）周一表示，他已与 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）达成协议，将在日本成立一家合资企业，为企业客户提供人工智能服务。【原文：SoftBank Group CEO Masayoshi Son said on Monday he has agreed with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman to set up a joint venture in Japan to offer artificial intelligence services to corporate customers.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国人可能在与墨西哥、加拿大和中国的贸易战中感受到 "痛苦
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他对墨西哥、加拿大和中国征收的全面关税可能会给美国人带来 "短期 "痛苦，因为全球市场担心这些征税可能会破坏经济增长并重新引发通货膨胀。【原文：President Donald Trump said the sweeping tariffs that he has imposed on Mexico, Canada and China may cause "short term" pain for Americans as global markets reflected concerns the levies could undermine growth and reignite inflation.】

item.title: 聚焦：尽管澳大利亚严格禁止未成年人使用社交媒体，但对 YouTube 的豁免仍存在风险
item.description: 澳大利亚政府在通过禁止 16 岁以下儿童访问社交媒体的法律时，为 YouTube 规定了一项豁免，但一些心理健康和极端主义专家说，视频共享网站会让他们接触到令人上瘾的有害内容。【原文：Australia's government carved out an exemption for YouTube when it passed laws banning social media access for children under 16, but some mental health and extremism experts say the video-sharing website exposes them to addictive and harmful content.】

item.title: 特朗普征收关税后，台湾将帮助企业迁往美国
item.description: 台湾经济部周一表示，台湾将支持有意迁往美国的企业，包括帮助它们在当地寻找合作伙伴，并概述了在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收新关税后台湾将提供的援助。【原文：Taiwan will support firms that intend to relocate to the United States including helping them find partners on the ground, the economy ministry said on Monday, outlining assistance it will offer following U.S. President Donald Trump's new tariffs.】

item.title: 高盛称特朗普关税对石油和天然气价格影响有限
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）在周日的一份报告中表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对从加拿大、墨西哥和中国进口的商品征收的新关税可能会对全球石油和天然气价格产生有限的短期影响。【原文：The new tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump on imports from Canada, Mexico, and China are likely to have a limited near-term impact on global oil and gas prices, Goldman Sachs said in a note on Sunday.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战炮火震撼市场
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对美国主要贸易伙伴征收关税后，投资者周一买入美元、抛售股票并担心通货膨胀，争相评估贸易战风险。【原文：Investors bought dollars, sold stocks and fretted about inflation on Monday in a scramble to assess the risk of trade war after Donald Trump put tariffs on top U.S. trading partners.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，亚洲汽车制造商跌幅居前
item.description: 周一，日本和韩国汽车制造商及其供应商的股票领跌亚洲股市，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对墨西哥、加拿大和中国全面征收关税，使整个地区的出口商遭受重创。【原文：Shares of Japanese and South Korean car makers and their suppliers led declines in Asia on Monday, as exporters across the region were walloped by U.S. President Donald Trump's introduction of sweeping tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China.】

item.title: 印度誓言避免发出贸易保护主义信号
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）采取关税举措之际，印度财政部最高官员在削减高端摩托车进口关税后表示，印度不想发出任何保护主义的信号。【原文：India does not want to give any signal that it is protectionist, the top bureaucrat in the finance ministry said, after slashing import duties on high-end motorcycles, amid U.S. President Donald Trump's moves on tariffs.】
